name: Will Farrington
body:
# Hello

I'm @wfarr, and I work on System Operations at GitHub.

You can reach me via:

* [twitter](http://twitter.com/wfarr)
* [email](mailto:wcfarrington+blogform@gmail.com)

## Talks

I like to give talks at user groups and conferences. If you're interested in having me give a talk at your event, please contact me!

Here are some of the talks I've given:

* [Graphs: Lessons Learned (With Science!)](https://speakerdeck.com/u/wfarr/p/graphs-lessons-learned-with-science)
* [Kanban](https://speakerdeck.com/u/wfarr/p/kanban)
* [Learn You Some Riak](https://speakerdeck.com/u/wfarr/p/learn-you-some-riak)
tagline: knowing an personal website since very recently
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
